occupation: Vice President, Founders Office Strategy at Infra.Market
headline: Founders Office - Strategy at Infra.Market
summary:
Experienced Strategy, Sales and Supply Chain Transformation professional with proven record of design and implementation of solutions in Consumer & Industrial Products, Logistics & Real Estate sectors. 

Led large pursuits, generated business and delivered large-scale transformation projects involving Analytics, Automation and Business solutions for corporates and start-ups in India, UK, Middle East and North Africa working with cross-functional teams to deliver strong outcomes.

Experience across Business Strategy Design & Implementation, Business Transformation including Supply Chain, Route-To-Market design, Procurement, Digital interventions and EBITDA improvement

Published articles and spoke at Industry events

experiences.title: Vice President, Founders Office Strategy
experiences.description: Driving Strategy & Execution from the Founders' Office

experiences.title: Vice President - Business
experiences.description:
As the Head of Business, I am responsible for:
•	Business & Revenue growth
•	Sales, Marketing and Supply Chain
•	Business Strategy & New Revenue Streams

experiences.title: Director, Business Consulting
experiences.description:
•	Business Consultant to the C-Suite
•	Selling and Delivering large scale engagements
•	Practice Development

Key Engagements

Strategy
•	Diversification strategy and Route-To-Market design for a leading Consumer Products player
•	Strategy, Business Plan and Go-To-Market design and implementation for a leading Industrial 
          Logistics company to venture into 3PL Logistics; Trained the sales teams
•	Customer segmentation, Targeting and Go-To-Market assistance for a Professional services firm 
•	Transition Strategy and operating model design for a leading Real Estate Developer
•	Diversification Strategy design for a leading Indian shipping logistics company
•	Business Plan for a leading two-wheeler tyre manufacturer
•	Business Plan for a leading Indian Textile manufacturer to set up mfg operations in USA
•	Brand Franchise Transition for the economy brands of a leading Alco-Bev player in India

Business Transformation / Supply Chain
•	Business Transformation for a leading Consumer Durable company 
•	Supply Chain Transformation for a leading Beverage company 
•	Supply Chain Transformation for a leading Consumer Products company 
•	Business Portfolio Rationalization and Cost Reduction for a leading Global Logistics player 
•	Procurement Transformation for a leading Consumer Products player
•	Supply Chain Transformation for a leading Global Publishing player in India

experiences.title: Manager
experiences.description:
•  Strategy & Supply Chain Consulting
•  Project Management
•  New Business Development

Strategy
•	Led the Strategy & Business Plan development for the leading Real Estate conglomerate in Qatar
•	Led a multi-geography team spread across Bahrain, Qatar, Kuwait & India to develop diversification and investment strategy for a subsidiary of a sovereign wealth fund
•	Market Assessment and prioritization of the Real Estate services to foray into for a leading Investment firm
•	Business Plan and feasibility assessment for a mixed-use development project 

Supply chain / Cost Reduction
•	Cost reduction at the leading Real Estate conglomerate in Qatar; by identifying operational improvements across infrastructure, processes and staffing
•	Led a cross-functional team to reduce procurement costs by 12% and designed a Strategic Procurement Function for a leading hospitality chain in Bahrain

experiences.title: Senior Consultant
experiences.description:
Strategy & Supply Chain Consulting

Strategy 
•	Strategy and Business Plan for a major mining player to enter into Alloy Steel sector
•	Growth Strategy and Business plan for a leading Real Estate developer in India 
•	Turnaround strategy for a Public Sector bank in India 

Supply Chain / Process Improvement 
•	Business Process Reengineering for a leading FMCG player 
•	Business Process Re-engineering for a leading Indian Aluminium producer 
•	Policy & Process development for operations improvement for a leading Bank

education.field_of_study: Specialized in Strategy, Marketing, Finance, Systems

recommendations:
Aditya Jain



I have worked very closely with Janak for nearly 5 years. His calm demeanor and business acumen across industries has helped multiple firms transform. He lead a big team at EY ensuring successful business transformations spanning across business functions. He has exhibited solution oriented approach even in times of conflicts and uncertainty which helped build huge amount of trust for clients. Janak's attitude towards work has had a big impact on my professional career and he's always very willing to learn, evolve and innovate. Giving freedom to team, while bringing out their best outputs has been a hallmark of Janak's working style. I'm sure Janak will scale new heights and build more leaders wherever he work.

John Burdett



I worked with Janak on a number of supply chain optimisation projects in India to develop TCPL's capability and ensure that the supply chain was fit for the future. He brought constructive challenge, insight and rigour into the process to ensure that we secured an optimal solution for the future.
